content: 1 st make 6 single_crochet around the ch4-space skip 1 1 single_crochet in the next 6 single_crochet skip 1 6 single_crochet around the ch4-space skip 2 1 single_crochet in the next 3 sts* x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 28 single_crochet 1 ch1 round 11 colour a start in any ch1-corner * 4 single_crochet 1 single_crochet in the next 28 sts make sure not to miss the first hidden st fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 32 single_crochet round 12 colour f start in the third single_crochet of any corner * 1 pop ch1 skip 1 st x 4 times 1 fpdc around the fpdc from round 9 1 half_double_crochet in the next 5 sts 1 fpdc around the fpdc from round 9 ch1 skip 1 1 pop ch1 x 3 times 1 fpdc around the fpdc from round 9 skip 1 st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 5 sts 1 fpdc around the fpdc from round 9 ch1 skip 1 st 1 pop ch1 x 3 times skip 1 st* x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 10 pop 12 ch1 10 half_double_crochet 4 fpdc © 2023 krokoklint design made by lina kittel all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only the pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced distributed or resold translated published altered shared or posted for sale or for free over the internet or offline you may sell items made from this pattern but please do not claim this pattern as your own if you wish to share this pattern you may link to it but please do not reprint it on your site round 13 colour b start around any corner-pop * 1 fpdc + ch1 + fpdc around the corner-pop 1 double_crochet in the ch1 1 fpdc around the pop x 3 times 1 double_crochet in the ch1 1 fpdc around the fpdc from the prev round skip 1 st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 4 sts 1 fpdc around the fpdc 1 double_crochet in the ch1 1 fpdc around the pop x 3 times 1 double_crochet in the ch1 1 fpdc around the fpdc from the prev round skip 1 st 1 half_double_crochet in the next 4 sts 1 fpdc around the fpdc from the prev round 1 double_crochet in the ch1 1 fpdc around the pop x 3 times 1 double_crochet* x 4 times fasten_off and weave in your ends stitch count per side 1 ch1 15 fpdc 12 double_crochet 8 half_double_crochet round 14 colour c pay attention to this round there are a lot of different stitches because we want to make the edge more even and get a good start on the border the main rule for this and the following rounds is that you make ordinary stitches in ordinary stitches and front posts around front post stitches start in any ch1-corner * 2 double_crochet + ch1 + 2
